ComicInfo.Summary:
The reality storm still rages outside as an apprentice from the necropolis Litharge tells his tale of death and burial, featuring an appearance by the lost Endless: Destruction! "World's End" part 5, the penultimate installment of the ZERO HOUR tie-in arc.
An apprentice from the Necropolis Litharge relates his story as the Reality Storm rages outside. It is a tale of death and burial, featuring the lost Destruction of the Endless.
Outer story (pgs 1, 2, 24):
Penciller: Bryan TalbotInker: Mark BuckinghamInner story (pgs 3-24):
Penciller: Shea Anton PensaInker: Vincent Locke
ComicInfo.Title: Worlds' End, Part 5: Cerements
